price: A fi ègún tẹ̀lé wọn nílé ayé yìí àti ní Ọjọ́ Àjíǹde. Gbọ́, dájúdájú ìran ‘Ād ṣàì gbàgbọ́ nínú Olúwa wọn. Kíyè sí i, kí ìjìnnà sí ìkẹ́ máa jẹ́ ti ìran ‘Ād, ìjọ (Ànábì) Hūd.
arabic: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ عَادٗا كَفَرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّعَادٖ قَوۡمِ هُودٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'biʿū fī hādhihi al-dun'yā laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati alā inna ʿādan kafarū rabbahum alā buʿ'dan liʿādin qawmi hūdin
